page.title: 07PRESTON CARIBBEAN CARNIVAL
page.content: My name is Dionne Jude. I am eleven. I was born in England. My family come from Dominica, an island in the West Indies. My parents and grandparents come from Dominica. The carnival was started in the West Indies and people from there brought it to Britain. There are many floats each with its own band. In the carnival the best float wins. I was born on the fairy tale float. I was a pearl. My costume was peach coloured. It has pants at the top and a pearl shaped hat, and I had a shell on my back. We danced to Calypso and Reggae music.
